articles.title: EXCLUSIVE ASEAN states object as China lobbies for Myanmar junta to join summit: sources - Reuters
articles.description: A Chinese envoy has lobbied Southeast Asian nations to let Myanmar's military ruler attend a regional summit being hosted by China's president next week but has met stiff opposition, diplomatic sources said on Thursday.
